current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

external-xref.#tail:
to provide for the display of the congressional gold medal awarded to
			 the Montford Point Marines, United States Marine Corps, by the Smithsonian
			 Institution and at other appropriate locations.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended by adding at the end the following:

quote.#text: An Act to grant the congressional gold medal to the Montford Point Marines

header.#text: Display of congressional gold medal by the Smithsonian Institution

text.#text: Following the award of the gold medal in honor of the Montford Point Marines,
